author: zbrown
msg: Removed an obsolete reference to future.texi.

author: zbrown
msg: Collected all ideas for future development into the IDEAS file, and reorganized
them to put like with like. After culling all ideas from
doc/programmer/design/future.texi, that file has been removed.
There is still room for better organization, but at least everything's in one
place now.

author: philip
msg: Allow revert of directories that are both scheduled for deletion and
missing from the working copy.
* subversion/libsvn_client/revert.c (svn_client_revert): Don't lock
directory if it has been removed.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/basic_tests.py (basic_revert): Test
revert of directories that are both scheduled for deletion and missing.
Fix a bug in the test for revert of directories that are both scheduled
for addition and missing. It's obviously not a very good test as it was
passing!

author: kfogel
msg: Make the COMMITTERS file reflect reality:
Remove Mark Murphy because he explicitly said he wouldn't be working
on Subversion (in fact, I think he asked to be removed, but it was a
long time ago).
Remove Lefty and Matt, who have never committed and don't participate
actively.  We added them early on, when they expressed interest in
Subversion, because everyone who knows them knows they're careful and
would do no harm :-), and also this was before the process of adding
committers was formalized.  But nowadays, the COMMITTERS list is used
for non-code-related things like voting on new commit access, so it's
good to keep it accurate.

author: kfogel
msg: Simplify the code path that determines whether or not an
svn_ra_callbacks_t table gets a set_wc_prop callback.  Like revision
3558, this is a preparatory change for resolving issue #806.  Thanks
to Mike Pilato for extra eyes and brains.
* subversion/libsvn_client/client.h, subversion/libsvn_client/ra.c
(svn_client__open_ra_session): Get rid of read_only_wc parameter.
In practice it just indicated that this is a commit, and we already
have the commit_items parameter for that.  All callers changed.
Note that the call from svn_client_switch which passed FALSE was
deceptive, because the ra layer never actually invoked set_wc_prop
in that case.  Instead, it handled wc prop changes via the editor.
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit.c
(svn_client_import): Rescope and clarify comment.
